xtiny-doc-page.title: Templates
xtiny-doc-page.paragraph: The templates are available from Jext file menu and allow to quickly create a new file.

The templates menu is built from the directory jext_directory/bin/templates. This directory can be set in the options dialog. When clicking on a template, Jext will prompt you for each variable specified in the chosen template. At the end, Jext will ask you to save the file. Once saved, this file will be automatically opened for editing.

To create a new template, create a new file and place it in the templates directory. You define variables using the following sequence: __VARIABLE__ (2 underscores on each side). If you want to enter the two underscores (__) without having it interpreted by Jext as a variable, enter ____ (4 underscores).
